name: 2-Pack Cat Food Ant Barrier Bowls — Ant Proof Cat Food Bowls Tray with Water Moat Design, 10 in Diameter, One-Piece Integrated Bowl, Easy-Clean, Non-Slip Base, Dark Green & Dark Gray
short_description: 2-Pack Two Colors Set of two in dark green & dark gray for pairing or separate placement.
Water Moat Design A 360° water channel separates the tray base and bowl island—aligned with cat food ant barrier use.
Integrated Bowl Tray One-piece “bowl-in-bowl” structure keeps the feeding station steady.
Ant Proof Cat Food Bowls Structure Continuous moat with no crossing ribs helps separate access paths.
10-Inch Size Each bowl is ~10 in diameter and ~3.7 in high—ideal for daily meals and water.
Non-Slip Base Wide base with anti-skid design helps reduce movement on floors.
Indoor/Outdoor Use Great for patios, balconies, porches, garages, and community feeding spots; works well for multi-cat homes.
product_description: Designed for cat food ant barrier use, these ant proof cat food bowls feature a water moat design that creates a 360° separation between the tray base and the bowl island. Size: each bowl ~10 in × 10 in × 3.7 in; 2-Pack, dark green & dark gray. Build: integrated ant proof cat bowl tray with a continuous channel and a wide, non-slip base. Tips: add clean water to the outer channel; refresh as needed; keep the moat and rim clear of debris to avoid bridging. Best for patios, balconies, porches, garages, indoor feeding corners, and community spots—great for multi-cat households.

name: 1 Pcs Cat Food Bowl 25 oz Cat Dog Pet Food Bowl Plastic Double No Spill Feeding Water Bowls Ants go Away Feeding Bowls for Small Medium Pets (Pink)
short_description: 【Durable Material】The cat bowl is made of high-quality PP plastic, which is sturdy, bite-resistant and odor-free. The thickened design ensures long-term use and reliably meets the daily feeding and drinking needs of small and medium-sized pets

【Practical Design】With a double bowl design, these cat food bowls can be fed and drank at the same time. The external water tank can be filled with water to prevent ants and other small bugs from entering the pet's food, ensuring a hygienic eating environment

【Easy to Maintain】The cat food and water bowl set is designed for easy cleaning, and the smooth surface can be quickly hand washed or put in the dishwasher. The simple design saves time and energy, keeping the pet's feeding area clean with minimal maintenance

【Stable and Safe】The non-slip base ensures that the pet bowls remain stable on the floor, preventing spills, making it easier for pets to eat and drink. The ergonomic design is suitable for small and medium-sized pets and provides a comfortable feeding experience

【Multi-functional Use】These ant proof cat food bowls are suitable for holding dry food, wet food, water or snacks, suitable for cats, dogs and other small animals. Form a pink color to match the pet's personality or home decoration

name: The 3-in-1 Ant Free Pet Dish (Large Red)
short_description: 3-in-1 Ant Free Pet Dish 🐾 Food and Water System All in One
Raised food bowl for comfortable and easier swallowing. Disassembles for easy cleaning. Durable and non-toxic.
Food Bowl – 5” in diameter, approximately 2 cups (16 oz.). Recommended for owners that have more than one cat. Also big enough for medium and some large dogs.

A safe water barrier separates your pet's food from ants. Hidden below the raised food dish is a water reservoir that creates and impenetrable barrier between ants and your pet's food. No pesticides or toxic detergents are necessary. This organic solution provides for your pet's safety and is environmentally friendly while eliminating ants from your pet's food supply. 🐾
